adsTrackersAllowed.message: Ads & trackers are allowed on this site

alwaysAllowAdsOnSites.message: Always allow ads on the following sites

balancedBlockingDescription.message: Block known trackers, even more ads for a faster browsing experience.

balancedBlockingExtraDescription.message: All in Basic Blocking and Social media ads

basicBlockingDescription.message: Block known trackers and ads that disrupt your browsing experience.

basicBlockingExtraDescription.message: Known trackers, Pop-up and banner ads, including videos

extShortDesc.message: Finally, an efficient blocker. Easy on CPU and memory.

refreshWarning.message: When you turn Privacy Guard ON or OFF, your page will automatically refresh, and changes you made might not be saved. Please make sure to save any work before changing Privacy Guard.

setStrictDescription_avast.message: A very few non-invasive ads help us fund Avast Secure Browser. They don’t interrupt your browsing and help keep your browser free. Please show us some love by allowing these ads.

setStrictDescription_avg.message: A very few non-invasive ads help us fund AVG Secure Browser. They don’t interrupt your browsing and help keep your browser free. Please show us some love by allowing these ads.

setStrictDescription_ccleaner.message: A very few non-invasive ads help us fund CCleaner Secure Browser. They don’t interrupt your browsing and help keep your browser free. Please show us some love by allowing these ads.

settingsDescription.message:
Enhanced privacy protection. Safeguard your identity from trackers and more.
Block ads & trackers for faster, safer browsing.

settingsShowNumberBadge.message: Show the number of blocked ads on the icon

sitesYouHaveAllowed.message: Sites you've allowed ads on will appear here

strictBlockingDescription.message: Block everything automatically for a faster, uninterrupted browser experience.

strictBlockingDescriptionExtra.message: This setting might cause some sites to not load properly (some content might not be displayed or if the site looks broken turn this setting off).

strictBlockingExtraDescription.message: All as Balanced Blocking and browser notifications and fingerprinting

strictModalDescription.message: To keep our browser free, we depend on partners that fund us through some non-disruptive and user-friendly ads. Our goal is to enable you to enhance your privacy and safeguard your online identity

visitSPC.message: Visit Security & Privacy Center for other settings

whitelistModalDescription.message: What site do you want to allow ads on?
